DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of the intravitreal implant of dexamethasone for the treatment of macular edema associated with branch retinal vein occlusion.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety and Efficacy of a New Treatment for Macular Edema Resulting From Branch Retinal Vein Occlusion
DOC.criteria: Macular edema resulting from branch retinal vein condition The criteria for visual acuity and macular thickness are met History of glaucoma Diabetic retinopathy Known steroidresponder Use of systemic steroids Use of Warfarin/Heparin
